fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Contact a player at night. You will form a private night chat (Discord channel) with them. If you already created a chat, you will add that target. This chat is undetectable to roles that can read private chats. If your target is not an Institution member, your ability fails.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Unique role.
- If a player rolls Messenger and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
You contacted \_\_\_\_\_\_, but they weren't involved with the Institution. (Ability failed due to targeting non-Institution)
You were contacted by a Messenger, but you're not a member of the Institution.
You contacted \_\_\_\_\_\_ and started conversing with them in secret. (Private chat created)
You contacted \_\_\_\_\_\_ and informed them of the rendezvous location. (Player added to the private chat)
You were contacted by a Messenger!
